DOC.brief_summary: Combination use darbepoetin G-CSF improve leave ventricular systolic function patient acute myocardial infarction receive intracoronary infusion mobilize peripheral blood stem cell comparison patient treat conventional measure receive intracoronary infusion mobilize peripheral blood stem cell G-CSF alone .
DOC.criteria: ST elevation acute myocardial infarction < 80years successful revascularization culprit vessel uncontrolled congestive heart failure uncontrolled myocardial ischemia uncontrolled ventricular arrhythmia malignancy serious hematologic disease chronic renal failure
